Mehta Family School of DS&AI, IIT Guwahati

Bachelor of Science (BSc) Programme

In addition to our flagship BTech programme in Data Science and AI, we are offer a globally accessible BSc programme through the Coursera platform. This meticulously designed programme aims to prepare a talented pool of individuals, from across age, globe, and professional career, to tackle the growing challenges in the world around us using DS&AI.
  • Upon completion, students will possess the necessary qualifications, skills, and resources to pursue diverse roles within the technology sector. To offer flexibility, students admitted to the programme can choose their own pace and customize their course of study.
  • They have the option to register for a reduced number of courses in a trimester if desired. The programme offers multiple entry and exit points allowing students to tailor their learning experience to their needs.
  • Furthermore, there is an optional 4-week campus immersion plan at IIT Guwahati, providing hands-on training opportunities.
  • Whether you are a working professional seeking to enhance your skills in cutting-edge technologies or a recent Class XII graduate, this programme is designed to cater to your needs.
For programme structure details check the IIT Guwahati admissions: Click here.
To gather more details about course material and delivery check the Coursera platform: Click here.
